backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing access control, user profiles, listening time, and song/playlist storage with admin features.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing high‑level summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme tokens for light and dark modes using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and manifest.
frontend/public/a2hs-beforeinstallprompt: Standalone demo page showing a styled beforeinstallprompt Add to Home Screen flow.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining icons, theme, start URL, and display mode.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker caching app shell and handling audio requests with a custom offline strategy.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app container managing screen routing, deep links, authentication state, messaging drawer, and onboarding modals. Coordinates providers and renders feature screens based on app state.
frontend/src/components/account/ProfileC: Modal requiring users to complete profile fields and submit them, with basic validation and profile-saving logic.
frontend/src/components/admin/AboutArtis: Admin editor for the artist profile, allowing viewing, editing, validating, and saving artist bio and links.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPassc: Modal for entering or disabling an admin passcode to toggle hidden admin mode, with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminOnly.t: Components that conditionally render or disable UI based on admin status, with optional fallback or tooltip behavior.
frontend/src/components/branding/AppHead: App header showing branding and a messages button with unread indicator for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeChannel: Displays the home banner with admin-only controls for uploading, setting, or clearing a custom image, plus long-press to open hidden admin mode.
Provides the main app layout with header, sidebar, starfield background, bottom tab bar, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/library/DeletePl: Renders a confirmation dialog for deleting user or official playlists, showing a loading state while pending.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryP: Manages user and official playlists including creation, deletion, listing, and opening playlist details with auth handling.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryT: Simple tab switcher for toggling between songs and playlists in the library.
frontend/src/components/library/Playlist: Shows playlist details, loads songs, and provides playback controls like play, shuffle, repeat, and song selection.
frontend/src/components/messaging/AdminC: Displays all user conversations for admins with user profiles, selection handling, and delete confirmation.
frontend/src/components/messaging/AdminI: Empty file or placeholder for future admin inbox drawer implementation.
frontend/src/components/messaging/Attach: Allows selecting and validating image, audio, or PDF attachments for messages with removal controls and error handling.
frontend/src/components/messaging/Delete: Provides a confirmation dialog to delete a conversation and triggers a delete mutation when confirmed.
frontend/src/components/messaging/MarioA: Renders a Mario-themed avatar using the home banner image with size options and a fallback icon.
frontend/src/components/messaging/MarioS: Displays a small online/offline pill indicating whether hidden admin mode is enabled.
frontend/src/components/messaging/Messag: Form for composing and sending messages or custom song requests with optional attachments and validation.
Displays a list of messages with sender labeling, attachments, delete options, and seen indicators.
frontend/src/components/messaging/Unifie: Drawer combining user and admin messaging views, handling message retrieval, sending, deletion, and seen-state updates.
frontend/src/components/messaging/UserMe: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Mobile bottom navigation bar with icons for switching between core app screens.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Sideb: Slide-out sidebar providing navigation, authentication controls, install prompts, and user profile details when signed in.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/First: Welcome dialog prompting users to sign in with Internet Identity on first launch.
frontend/src/components/player/MusicPlay: React audio player managing playback, progress, volume, and authenticated listening-time tracking. Integrates mutations for play counts and accumulated listening time with next/previous navigation.
frontend/src/components/pwa/A2HSBanner.b: Documentation describing rules for when the A2HS banner appears, hides, and persists session state. Notes that recent changes do not alter the banner’s behavior.
frontend/src/components/pwa/A2HSBanner.t: Component showing a PWA install banner based on install availability and sessionStorage state. Handles install prompt triggering and manual dismissal.
frontend/src/components/SignInModal.tsx: A modal or drawer prompting users to sign in via Internet Identity, handling login retries, cancellation, and pending actions.
frontend/src/components/songs/CreatePlay: Dialog or drawer for creating a playlist and adding a song to it, with auth checks and mutation handling. Validates name input and displays success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/songs/DownloadCh: Dialog or drawer letting users choose between offline app caching or device download. Renders two action buttons with loading support.
frontend/src/components/songs/Horizontal: Compact horizontal song card displaying cover art, metadata, play button, and overflow menu. Supports play interaction and engagement bar.
Scrollable horizontal row wrapper for song cards with a section title. Provides horizontal scrolling via ScrollArea and ScrollBar.
frontend/src/components/songs/PlaylistCh: Dialog or drawer for adding or removing a song from user playlists with auth handling. Loads playlists, toggles membership, and shows toasts for updates.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongCard.t: Grid-style song card showing artwork, metadata, play button, engagement bar, and optional delete action. Supports fallback image handling and overflow menu.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongEditor: Admin-only modal form for adding songs with file/URL uploads, validation, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongEngage: Displays like and play counts with optional like button handling user interactions.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongListRo: Renders a clickable song row with artwork, metadata, engagement bar, play button, and overflow actions.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongOverfl: Provides a dropdown/drawer menu for song actions like favorites, playlists, sharing, and downloads with auth checks.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongsSortB: Simple select control for choosing the song sorting mode.
frontend/src/components/visual/Starfield: Generates an animated starfield background in dark mode with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/config/featureFlags.ts: Defines feature flags, currently enabling desktop bottom tab bar behavior.
frontend/src/context/AdminContext.tsx: Exposes admin mode state derived from hidden admin mode with no async loading.
frontend/src/context/AuthContext.tsx: Manages authentication state, pending actions, and sign‑in modal behavior for protected features.
frontend/src/context/HiddenAdminModeCont: Implements hidden admin mode with passcode, session storage persistence, and activation via keyboard shortcut.
frontend/src/hooks/useA2HS.ts: Manages PWA install prompt events and exposes flags and a function to trigger installation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and refreshes a backend actor based on identity changes and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useFirstLaunchWelcome: Tracks whether a first‑launch welcome modal should be shown using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomeBanner.ts: Stores and updates a customizable home banner image in localStorage with file validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Deprecated hook that always reports no admin access.
frontend/src/hooks/useLikedSongs.ts: Returns liked song IDs for the authenticated user and a helper to check if a song is liked.
frontend/src/hooks/useListeningTime.ts: Mutation hook that adds listening time via the backend actor and refreshes the user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useLongPress.ts: Implements long‑press detection with movement tolerance using pointer events.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Evaluates a media query and provides a mobile‑specific helper hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessaging.ts: Provides queries and mutations for user messaging, including sending attachments and managing messages.
frontend/src/hooks/usePendingAction.ts: Executes queued user actions after authentication, handling likes, favorites, playlist actions, caching, and downloads with toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating songs, playlists, and artist data, including admin-gated song uploads and deletions.
frontend/src/hooks/useSettings.ts: Manages app settings stored in localStorage, exposing a context for updating preferences like audio quality and animation reduction.
frontend/src/hooks/useSongEngagement.ts: Handles song likes and play tracking, triggering auth flow when required and delegating mutations to query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Provides theme state and persistence, enabling toggling between light and dark modes via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and updates the caller's user profile with React Query, and includes helpers for completeness checks and listening-time formatting.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus animation and input appearance rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, setting up QueryClient and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutArtistScreen.tsx: Displays the artist's profile with social links and an optional admin editor, falling back to defaults when profile data is missing.
frontend/src/pages/ContactScreen.tsx: Renders a contact page with buttons to open the messaging interface and explains message and song request options.
frontend/src/pages/CustomSongRequestsScr: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Displays home view with song lists, music player, sorting, and admin deletion support.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryScreen.tsx: Manages library tabs, favorites, playlists, and music playback with queue, shuffle, and repeat logic.
frontend/src/pages/SearchScreen.tsx: Provides keyword song search with results grid and integrated music player.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsScreen.tsx: Shows configurable audio, visual, and notification settings using various UI controls.
frontend/src/pages/SongsScreen.tsx: Lists all songs with sorting, playback, and admin delete capabilities plus deep-link handling.
frontend/src/pages/SupportScreen.tsx: Displays support info and link for donations via Buy Me a Coffee.
frontend/src/pages/ThemesScreen.tsx: Provides a UI screen for switching between light and dark themes using buttons and visual highlights.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load and logs success or failure.
frontend/src/utils/artistProfileValidati: Validates artist profile URLs and returns field-level errors plus helpers to detect if any errors exist.
frontend/src/utils/authorizationErrors.t: Maps authentication and admin-related errors to user-friendly messages and offers helpers to classify error types.
frontend/src/utils/dataUrl.ts: Detects data URLs and converts base64-encoded data URLs into byte arrays.
frontend/src/utils/deepLinks.ts: Builds, parses, and clears song deep-link URLs using query or hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Validates audio URLs, generates safe filenames, and triggers browser-based downloads for songs.
Validates message attachment files by type and size and converts File objects to byte arrays.
frontend/src/utils/offlineAudioCache.ts: Manages offline caching of audio files, including adding, checking, removing, and clearing cached audio.
frontend/src/utils/playlistPlayback.ts: Provides playlist utilities like shuffle, next/previous index handling, and finding songs by ID.
frontend/src/utils/share.ts: Supports sharing via Web Share API or clipboard with fallbacks for older browsers.
frontend/src/utils/songSort.ts: Implements deterministic sorting of songs by newest, top liked, or most heard with tie‑breakers.
frontend/src/utils/structuredMessageForm: Formats normal messages and custom song requests into structured, readable text blocks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, shadows, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, current feature scope, architectural notes, and known issues for the system.
